BLCottFausBIII.First Lines:
Almyȝty god in trinite fader & sone and holy gosteHelpe
                    and spede and consell me as þu god of myȝtus moste…
BLCottFausBIII.Last Lines:
…Þat we mowe come after owre deytheTo þe same plase
                    þeras seynt Ede ys
BLCottFausBIII.Note: Folio number reflects the most recent foliation.
BLCottFausBIII.Editions:
Black,  William Henry. 
             Chronicon Vilodunense, sive De vita et miraculis Sanctae
                Edithae….
         London: Nichols, 1830. 
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             St. Editha.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1883.
